transcript.text: hey luke here with the outdoor boys
youtube channel and uh welcome to a
little v-log we're gonna do something a

give you a little bit of a
behind-the-scenes peek at what it's like
to be a full-time youtuber and it is a
weird weird life but there's a lot of
things that go on behind the scenes that
you guys just don't see so i'm gonna
share a little bit of that um so first
off
this week i have been working on a
project that has been frustrating me
frustrating me for
over two years now on and off i have
been experimenting with primitive
fishing techniques and trying to figure
out how to use fishing gorges which is
a way that people used to make hooks
back in the old days
and i can catch bluegill and little
panfish with fishing gorges no problem
i've done several videos where i've just
rocked it i'm really good at it but i've
always wanted to catch a catfish or
bigger fish
on fishing gorges or homemade hooks or
that sort of thing so i have been
running around trying to find places to
buy cow bones to use to make bone
fishing gorges and fishing hooks and it
turns out petco is the place to do it so
anyway i'm gonna work on that

it's gonna rain on me better take cover
